title: Why wont my league open?
body: I clicked on the league icon on my desktop and its not opening it just shows the logo then disappears. I've tried to deleting files, re-installing, and all the possible solutions i could find but nothing seems to work. What can I do to fix this annoying thing?

replies.body: I've been having a similar problem. When i click my LoL icon the launcher window pops up, but when I click launch my computer thinks  for a few seconds then nothing happens. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling as well as restarting and the problem persists. I can run other games just fine so I know it's not my computer. This started after the last update, what happened?

Hey Alien,

Were you able to run through the Launcher section of the [Wrenchmen's Toolbox](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues)? If you were able to and are still experiencing these issues, please let me know!
